header.name: Halls of the Leper King
header.author: BSP-Dungeon-Generator
header.description: Long after the Leper King's fall the halls remained deserted. Lately they were squatted by a party of goblins.

game_elements.name: Item 1
game_elements.description: A mantle among rubble on the ground.

game_elements.name: Item 2
game_elements.description: A battered stone double door to the east.

game_elements.name: Item 3
game_elements.description: An arrogant pockmarked dwarf. Wants to pay you to get rid of a strange, unnaturally heavy leather armor.

game_elements.name: Item 4
game_elements.description: A strongbox with a bottle of wine, some gold and a regular glaive.
